skill.name: Crippling Wave
skill.description:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Unleash a series of large sweeping attacks that deal 155% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies in front of you.

Every third hit also dazes enemies within 11 yards, slowing their movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Sweeping punches that cripple enemies, reducing their attack and movement speed.

rune.name: Mangle
rune.description: Increase damage to 255% weapon damage as Fire.
rune.simpleDescription:
Increase damage of Crippling Wave.

Crippling Wave's damage turns into Fire.

skill.name: Wave of Light
skill.description:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Focus a wave of light that crushes enemies for 835% weapon damage as Holy.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Ring a mystic bell that crushes enemies.

rune.name: Explosive Light
rune.description: Release bursts of energy that deal 830% weapon damage as Fire to nearby enemies.
rune.simpleDescription: Release bursts of energy that deal Fire damage to enemies.

skill.name: Sweeping Wind
skill.description:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Surround yourself in a vortex that continuously deals 105% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards. The vortex lasts 6 seconds and is refreshed each time you strike an enemy with a melee attack. Landing a Critical Hit has a chance to increase the vortex effect up to 3 stacks for a total of 315% weapon damage.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Surround yourself in a vortex for 6 seconds that damages nearby enemies. Critical Hits intensify the vortex.

rune.name: Inner Storm
rune.description:
As long as your vortex is at 3 or more stacks, you gain 8 Spirit per second.

Sweeping Wind's damage turns into Holy.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain Spirit whenever the vortex is at 3 or more stacks.

Sweeping Wind's damage turns into Holy.

skill.name: Dashing Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash up to 50 yards, striking enemies along the way for 370% weapon damage as Physical.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash and strike enemies.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.

rune.name: Quicksilver
rune.description:
Increases maximum charges to .

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Lightning.
rune.simpleDescription:
Increases maximum charges.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Lightning.

skill.name: Mantra of Conviction
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: Damage bonus is increased to 16% for 3 seconds.

Passive: Enemies within 30 yards of you take 8% increased damage.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: Damage bonus is increased for a short duration.

Passive: Nearby enemies take increased damage.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.

rune.name: Overawe
rune.description: Passive: Increase the strength of Mantra of Conviction so that enemies take 12% increased damage.
rune.simpleDescription: Passive: Increases the damage bonus of Mantra of Conviction.

skill.name: Mystic Ally
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Active: Your mystic ally has its damage increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side. The ally deals 130% of your weapon damage as Physical per swing. When the ally dies, it is reborn after 5 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Active: Your mystic ally has its damage increased for a short duration.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side.

rune.name: Air Ally
rune.description:
Active: You gain 100 Spirit.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side that increases your Spirit Regeneration by 4.
rune.simpleDescription:
Active: You gain a burst of Spirit.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side that increases your Spirit Regeneration.

skill.name: Beacon of Ytar
skill.flavor: It is only through hardship that we come to know our limits, and only through knowing our limits that we learn to shatter them.

skill.name: Exalted Soul
skill.description:
Increase maximum Spirit by 50 and increase Spirit Regeneration by 4 per second.

Spirit fuels your defensive and offensive abilities.
skill.flavor: "Endeavor to be one with the hidden truth and you will soar beyond the sky." â€”Waykeeper Tzo Krin

skill.name: Chant of Resonance
skill.description: The Spirit costs of Mantra activation effects are reduced by 50% and you gain 4 Spirit every second when you have a Mantra learned.
skill.flavor: The world continues on the noble path, each of us carrying another, all connected, ever onward.

skill.name: Fleet Footed
skill.flavor: Strength out of place is no strength at all.

mainHand.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

skill.name: Heal
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar for 193112 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar.

skill.name: Intimidate
skill.description: Enemies that hit or are hit by the Templar are slowed by 80% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Enemies that hit or are hit by the Templar are slowed.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Guardian
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Rush to your aid, knocking back enemies within 15 yards and healing you for 182383 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

When your Life is low, the Templar will come to your aid, knocking back nearby enemies and healing you.

skill.name: Charm
skill.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Charms an enemy to fight for you for 8 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Temporarily Charms an enemy to fight for you.

skill.name: Powered Armor
skill.description: Buffs you and the Enchantress, increasing Armor by 3% and slowing melee attackers by 60% for 1 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Increases Armor and slows melee attackers for you and the Enchantress.

skill.name: Disorient
skill.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Cast a flash of light in an area, causing enemies to be disoriented for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Disorients enemies for a short time.

skill.name: Mass Control
skill.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Lob a bulb of magical energy that hexes enemies in an area into chickens for 5 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Hexes a nearby group of enemies.
